document_data.mainbody:
Nararoot was a tuber that was used as birth control throughout Faerûn. Much cheaper than cassil herbs, which were used by men, nararoot shavings were taken by women. Nararoot could be diluted and steeped into tea for a more pleasant flavor. Ingesting nararoot rendered the drinker infertile for a week or two.
* Cassil
* Thaerefoil
CategoryTeas
CategoryHerbs
CategoryVegetation
CategoryContraceptives
